segments.text: I notice the little boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so high, and that stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch—what if he falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it’s completely normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should be helping him instead of just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out—I’ve never seen anything so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even knows they’re back there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s so focused on that plate, she might as well be in another room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it ends badly.
segments.speaker: PAR
